verses.text:
What will you do when Jesus comes
In power and great glory?
Will you be ready to go up
And meet him in the sky?

What will you do when earth and sea
Give up their sleeping dead?
Will you be found among the just
Or with the lost instead?

What will you do when books are opened
And the dead are judged?
Will your name be written there
In the Lamb's book of life?

What will you do when the great white throne
Appears before your eyes?
Will you be able then to stand
Before the Judge of all?

O sinner, flee to Jesus now,
While mercy's door stands open;
Accept his gracious offered love,
And let your heart be broken.

O come to Jesus while you may,
He's waiting to receive you;
O come to Jesus while you may,
He's able to save you.
